permission.title: Require Ownership
permission.description: Must own the resource you are requesting

examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
 {
    "permissions": [
        "post:read",
        "post:interact",
        "user:edit_content",
        "user:delete",
        "user:read"
    ],
    "gender": "",
    "about": "",
    "following": [],
    "followers": [],
    "_id": "5f3dcd97832746181006b1eb",
    "username": "JohnDoe",
    "phone_number": "000-111-2222",
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "email": "a@mail.com",
    "createdAt": "2020-08-20T01:10:47.626Z",
    "updatedAt": "2020-08-20T01:10:47.626Z",

}

title: Get Specific User Info

200.description: The username of the person in Cognito
Timestamp of last update to user profile
Not present if there is no profile photo but otherwise looks like the example

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
   {
       "about": "This is a bio",
       "following": [{
           "_id" : "5f6565f0c1708f4ad08477c7",
           "username" : "user1"
       }],
       "followers": [],
       "_id": "5f6565f0c1708f4ad08477c7",
       "cognito_username": "5627cc28-bb8f-4806-9cc9-30e2f4d042ed",
       "username": "matthew5",
       "first_name": "matt",
       "last_name": "burr",
       "createdAt": "2020-09-19T01:59:12.041Z",
       "updatedAt": "2020-09-19T02:00:28.398Z",
       "profile_photo": {
           "_id": "5f65663cc1708f4ad08477c8",
           "key": "397fec5422857e916e1fa0abeea28e32_profile_photo",
           "mimetype": "image/jpeg"
   }

title: Sign Up
description: Sign in a new user to Locker
name: PostApiUsers

Request body.description: Required Username (unique, alphanumeric (underscore allowed), at most 32 characters)
Required Password (at least 7 characters; at least 1 number; at least one of @, !, #, $, % or ^; at least 1 uppercase letter)

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
 "first_name"    : "John",
 "last_name"     : "Doe",
 "username"      : "JohnDoe",
 "email"         : "John.Doe@gmail.com",
 "phone_number"  : "+123456789",
 "password"      : "JohnDoeP@ssw@rd123#"
}

title: Update Profile Information
description: Update profile of a specific user and returns the updated profile to that user.
name: PutApiUsersUserId

permission.name: OwnershipRequired
permission.title: Require Ownership
permission.description: Must own the resource you are requesting

Request body.description: Description of user (Cannot exceed 300 characters) * @apiSuccess (200) {Object} DeletedUser The user that has been deleted.

examples.title: Response (example):
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "permissions": [
        "post:read",
        "post:interact",
        "user:edit_content",
        "user:delete",
        "user:read"
    ],
    "gender": "",
    "about": "",
    "following": [],
    "followers": [],
    "_id": "5f3dd0cf4a3c392049ed1ed8",
    "username": "AnUpdatedUsername",
    "phone_number": "000-111-2222",
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "email": "a@mail.com",
    "createdAt": "2020-08-20T01:24:31.076Z",
    "updatedAt": "2020-08-20T01:25:08.140Z",
    "__v": 0
}

title: Update Password
description: Update profile of a specific user and returns the updated profile to that user.
name: PutApiUsersUserIdPassword

permission.name: OwnershipRequired
permission.title: Require Ownership
permission.description: Must own the resource you are requesting

Request body.description: Required Password (at least 7 characters; at least 1 number; at least one of @, !, #, $, % or ^; at least 1 uppercase letter)

examples.title: Response (example):

4xx.description: Invalid Fields: Either missing required fields or including additional.
Bad Request: New password is too short, the same as the old password, old_password doesn"t match the current password, etc.
Invalid or missing token in Authorization header (Authorization: bearer )
